name: Spooky Horror Game.EXE
description:
Hello, and welcome to Spooky Horror Game.EXE!!1! I hope you are prepared to be spooked, because this game is very haunted probably.

What's this game about?

This game is based on really bad good creepypasta-based horror games that seem to be made by people who don't know how to write good horror stories or make good games.

*Made for the#MetaGameJam by Xavier Ekkel*

*Thunder sound effects from Iwan Sounds and DIY on Youtube*

*Super Lario 64 title theme composition stolen from Super Mario 64's File Select Theme*

Pro Tip: Hold 'C' to skip through text faster.
